settings.question: How do I track my order?
settings.answer: Once your order has shipped, you will receive an email with tracking information. You can track your package through the carrier's website or by clicking the tracking link provided in the email.

settings.question: What is your return policy?
settings.answer: We offer 30-day returns on most items. Products must be unused, in original condition, and in original packaging. See our Return Policy for complete details.

settings.question: Do you offer installation services?
settings.answer: We recommend professional installation for gate and garage motors. Contact us for a list of certified installers in your area.

settings.question: What warranty do you provide?
settings.answer: We offer 2-5 years warranty on gate & garage motors, and 1 year on remote controls and accessories. See our Warranty Conditions for details.

settings.question: How do I choose the right motor for my gate?
settings.answer: Consider your gate type (swing or sliding), weight, size, power supply options, and security features. Check our Buying Guides or contact our experts for assistance.

settings.heading: Frequently Asked Questions
settings.introduction: Find answers to the most common questions about our automation solutions, orders, and services.
settings.contact_text: Contact our support team for personalized assistance.
